title: BoM News e3
description:
Thank you all for the support it’s wonderful sharing these jokes with you.  

If you’re interested in contributing to the BoM news or the BoM Hub in general get in contact with me on discord. If you’d like to interview or some such thing like that message me on BoM discord server. 

Freddie and Paul show
https://youtu.be/hqIljY2Ca4w

Meaning Code
https://youtu.be/16w3olAM9tc

Petersonitis 
https://youtu.be/J9_tXN88sJk

Pvk Friday q&a
https://youtu.be/YQCKOA5u_Hw

Benjamin Boyce 
https://youtu.be/E1iC9Dy4Paw

Thank you again, and if I’ve caused you harm or offended you in any way please reach out and we’ll see if I can make it right.
